name: 1 Button Spy
description:
*PLAY IN FULLSCREEN*

Rules: You are given a prompt in the top right and a morse code key in the bottom left. Left-Click the telegraph to input a dot, Right-Click the telegraph to input a dash,

This is my submission to the 1-Bit Jam. The premise was to use black and white and meet the theme "One-Button". All visuals were made by my talented friend Vasu. Check out her work at @vasujay_art on Instagram.

I ran out of time before I could add more prompts, audio, a how to page, a credits page, and an explanation on the Play Menu,. I guess that happens in game jams.
